message: Let's split it evenly to start. Fair game?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need to get at least 50% to make this worth it.  Let's find a middle ground.
Come on, I'm taking on less loss from inflation. Meet me in the middle won't work now.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I'm not going any lower.  We need to find a way to split the difference before the inflation gets out of control.
Inflation is hitting you harder, I can wait it out. This is my best offer so far.
Inflation is hurting us both. Let's split it evenly again. We have to be reasonable.
